full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## F3065-230006-2 - Replacement of the service air compressor

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Canadian Coast Guard has reissued a request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a marine service air compressor. This RFP is for the replacement of the existing compressor onboard the CCGS Vincent Massey, including delivery of the equipment, spare parts, technical documentation, and warranty.

### Key Details
- **Tender ID**: F3065-230006-2
- **Reference Number**: WS3856922662-DOC3983304168
- **Publication Date**: May 15, 2023
- **Closing Date**: June 2, 2023, 14:00 EDT
- **Solicitation Method**: Invitation for Bids (IFB) on invite-only basis
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Evaluation Criteria**: N/A
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Solicitation Details

This RFP cancels and supersedes a previous solicitation, WS3856922662-DOC3806947469, dated February 23, 2023. Only bidders that submitted a bid in the previous solicitation will be invited to participate in this reissue. Canada will only consider proposals from invited suppliers, and any proposals submitted by uninvited bidders will not be considered.

 ### Contractor Responsibilities
- Bid submission must be made electronically
- Required supporting documentation must be submitted at the same time as the bid submission
- Bids must be submitted before the closing time to be considered

### Important Dates

- Bid submission deadline: May 25, 2023, 14:00 EDT (extended)
- Contract start date: N/A
- Contract end date: March 13, 2024
- Debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request for bidders who submitted a bid in the previous solicitation

**Note**: This RFP is for the department's internal use only.
